TLC_Tail Property

CDXML Name:Tail
CDX Constant Name:kCDXProp_TLC_Tail
CDX Constant Value:0x0AB1
Data Size:CDXCoordinate
Property of objects:kCDXObj_TLCSpot
First written/read in:ChemDraw 8.0
Required?No

Description:

The length of the "tail" of an individual spot.

If this property is absent:

The spot will be assumed to have no tail (it will be drawn as an undistorted ellipsoid).
